scripts.test:covtext: rm -rf ./coverage && NODE_ENV=test babel-node $(npm bin)/isparta cover --report text $(npm bin)/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register tests/index.js
scripts.test:cov: rm -rf ./coverage && NODE_ENV=test babel-node $(npm bin)/isparta cover --report html $(npm bin)/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register tests/index.js
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run test:covtext && npm run lint && npm run lib && npm run bundle && npm run compress && npm run lines && ls -ahl ./dist
scripts.build:travis: npm run test && npm run test:covtext && npm run lint && npm run lib && npm run bundle
